forecast.name: Today
forecast.detailedForecast: Patchy drizzle before 11am. Mostly sunny. High near 67, with temperatures falling to around 65 in the afternoon. West wind 7 to 15 mph, with gusts as high as 22 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Patchy drizzle after 11pm. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 58. West southwest wind 7 to 14 mph, with gusts as high as 21 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%.

weather_report:
As the day unfolds in Downtown San Francisco, a delicate patchwork of clouds dances across the sky, occasionally allowing bursts of sunlight to pierce through. The breeze carries the scent of the ocean, a reminder of the ever-present marine layer that creeps its way inland, bringing with it a touch of humidity. For now, the drizzles that graced the morning have receded, leaving a promise of clearer skies for the afternoon, though temperatures will begin to drift downwards as the sun makes its descent. A light wind weaves through the streets, cooling the warmth of the day, urging one to don layers for both comfort and style.

As evening approaches, expect the clouds to thicken, heralding the return of gentle drizzle. The city, cloaked in a soft shroud, will hold a unique charm perfect for cozying up with a book in a café window or embarking on a leisurely evening stroll through the streets, the air rich with the sounds of laughter and night-time chatter. Embracing casual layers—a light jacket over a comfortable shirt—will serve well through transitions in weather as well as shifting between the warmth of the day and the cool of night. It’s a moody, atmospheric San Francisco day, beckoning one to appreciate the subtle allure of the city.
